author: matthiasksieber
title: Loxe Inc. Plutus Internship Program
description: There are almost no internship programs for university students to get involved with Cardano, learn Haskell and Plutus.
solution: Provide new Plutus developers with mentorship and real world working experience.
experience: Loxe Inc. team, experienced and hackathon winning group of Plutus and AtalaPRISM developers, participants of Gimbalabs PPBL veterans.
